蚦字的基本解释

蚦
rán
同“蚺”。

蚦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rán］
［《廣韻》汝鹽切，平鹽，日。］
亦作“蚦1”。
(1)见“蚺蛇”。
(2)魏晋间西部少数民族名。
[②]［tiàn］
同“舑1”。

蚦字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蚦； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1078第23
【唐韻】汝鹽切【集韻】如占切【正韻】而占切，?音髥。【說文】大蛇，可食。【埤雅】蚦蛇，尾圓無鱗，身有斑文，如故暗錦纈，似鼉，行地常俯其首，膽隨日轉，上旬近頭，中旬在心，下旬近尾。【南越志】蚦蛇，牙有長五六寸者，土人重之。【述異記】晉顏含嫂病，須蚦蛇膽療之，不能得。忽一童子持靑囊授含，乃曰：眞蚦蛇膽也。【嵆康·養生論】蚦蛇珍於越土。【唐書·地理志】廣州土貢鼈甲、蚦蛇。　又南蠻名。【魏志·裴松之註】槃瓠之後，或號蚦氏。　又【類篇】汝甘切，音䛁。義同。　又【集韻】他念切，音栝。蚦䗊，獸吐舌貌。

蚦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蚦字的起名意思

暂无。

蚦
Basic explanation of words
蚦
rán
Same as "anaconda".
蚦
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [rán]
["Guangyun" Ru salt cut, flat salt, day. ]
Also known as "蚦1".
(1) See "Anaconda".
(2) The names of ethnic minorities in the west during the Wei and Jin Dynasties.
[②]［tiàn］
Same as "Fang 1".
蚦
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蚦; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1078 Page 23
[Tang Yun] Ru salt cut [Ji Yun] such as Zhanqi [Zheng Yun] and Zhanqi,? Yin 髥. [Said the text] Big snake, edible. [Pianya] The snake has a round tail without scales, and a striated body. It is dark brocade, like a steamer, and often bows its head. The bravery changes with the day. The head is near in the first ten days, the heart is in the middle ten days, and the tail is near the end in the last ten days. [Nan Yue Zhi] Viper, whose teeth are five or six inches long, is the most important for natives. [Said Yiji] Jinyan Hansao's disease can be treated with bile therapy for the beard and snake, which is not available. Suddenly a boy held the sac to give it to him. 【Rongkang·Health-preserving Theory】Viper is precious in Yue soil. 【Book of Tang·Geography】Guangzhou native tribute turtle shell and snake.　The name is Nanban. 【Wei Zhi·Pei Song's Note】After Panhu, it is also known as the name Yingshi.　[Classes] Ru Gan cut, sound 囁. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] He said cut, sound. The beast has a tongue-out appearance.
